page.title: 08Caversham Park Village
page.content: Caversham Park was planned by Davis Estates Ltd in about 1964. Although the housing estate is very recent {Caversham Park House}(now the B.B.C) dates back to about the reign of {Charles 1.}There are approximately 1500 houses and bungalows with flats as well. Recently a lot of council houses and old people's homes have been built.There are{two schools,}both Primary, which were built about 1970. In Caversham Park Primary a church service is held every Sunday at eleven. The other school is a Roman Catholic School with a swimming pool.There are two lots of{shops,}one near Emmer Green and the other at the end of the village. There are tennis courts quite near and also a park with swings, slide and a climbing frame. Reading is in near reach, being about a 20 minute ride on the bus.
